document_data.mainbody:
apprentice
Yolen Nieldot was an artificer for hire from the city of Neverwinter, active in the late 15 century DR.
By the late 15 century DR, Yolen Nieldot had spent two years apprenticing under a belligerent master artificer of Neverwinter. After quitting, Yolen made a living by offering her artificer services and doing smaller odd jobs until she found her own place in the world and home where Yolen could practice her trade.
